basic.description:
A foundation course in drawing and two-dimensional fundamentals aimed at developing basic skills in artistic production. One class per week will be devoted to learning safe procedures and technical skills in the wood-shop. There will be a half-day WHMIS safety training workshop. Students must pass both the technical skills and the WHMIS training components.
NOTE    Open only to students in a BFA Program.
LEARNING HOURS    288 (144Lb;144P)
basic.subject: ARTF
basic.title: Introductory Fine Art I

extra.enrollment_requirement:
NOTE open to ARTF &ARTV plans.
Exclusion  No more than 6 ARTF100;127
Exclusion  No more than 1 course fr ARTF101;105;106;127
Exclusion  No more than 6 units fr ARTF102;110;127.
One-Way Exclusion May not be taken with or after: ARTF125; 260; 265
